languages.text: {n}Стоит вам только подумать о том, чтобы вырвать руку, как челюсти сервитора смыкаются на ней со всей своей устрашающей силой. Боль прошивает мозг раскаленной иглой.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Стоит вам только подумать о том, чтобы вырвать руку, как челюсти сервитора смыкаются на ней со всей своей устрашающей силой. Боль прошивает мозг раскаленной иглой.{/n}

languages.text: {n}As soon as the thought of pulling your hand out crosses your mind, the servitor's jaws clench with all their frightening might. Pain shoots through your brain like a white-hot needle.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Стоит вам только подумать о том, чтобы вырвать руку, как челюсти сервитора смыкаются на ней со всей своей устрашающей силой. Боль прошивает мозг раскаленной иглой.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}As soon as the thought of pulling your hand out crosses your mind, the servitor's jaws clench with all their frightening might. Pain shoots through your brain like a white-hot needle.{/n}
{n}As soon as the thought of pulling your hand out crosses your mind, the servitor's jaws clench with all their frightening might. Pain shoots through your brain like a white-hot needle.{/n}

{n}As soon as the thought of pulling your hand out crosses your mind, the servitor's jaws clench with all their frightening might. Pain shoots through your brain like a white-hot needle.{/n}

languages.text: {n}手を引っ張り出そうとする考えがあなたの頭をよぎった瞬間、サーヴィターの口がその恐るべき力の全てでしっかりと締め付けた。痛みが熱い針のように脳を駆け巡る。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As soon as the thought of pulling your hand out crosses your mind, the servitor's jaws clench with all their frightening might. Pain shoots through your brain like a white-hot needle.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}手を引っ張り出そうとする考えがあなたの頭をよぎった瞬間、サーヴィターの口がその恐るべき力の全てでしっかりと締め付けた。痛みが熱い針のように脳を駆け巡る。{/n}

languages.text: {n}你刚刚想把手拽出来，巨口就收紧了下颚。恐怖的力量刺入了你的肉体，剧痛仿佛白热的尖针一样刺穿了你的大脑。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As soon as the thought of pulling your hand out crosses your mind, the servitor's jaws clench with all their frightening might. Pain shoots through your brain like a white-hot needle.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你刚刚想把手拽出来，巨口就收紧了下颚。恐怖的力量刺入了你的肉体，剧痛仿佛白热的尖针一样刺穿了你的大脑。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Kaum entsteht in deinem Verstand der Gedanke, die Hand herauszuziehen, beißen die Kiefer des Servitors mit all ihrer furchterregenden Macht zu. Schmerz schießt durch dein Gehirn wie eine glühende Nadel.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As soon as the thought of pulling your hand out crosses your mind, the servitor's jaws clench with all their frightening might. Pain shoots through your brain like a white-hot needle.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Kaum entsteht in deinem Verstand der Gedanke, die Hand herauszuziehen, beißen die Kiefer des Servitors mit all ihrer furchterregenden Macht zu. Schmerz schießt durch dein Gehirn wie eine glühende Nadel.{/n}

languages.text: {n}À l'instant même où l'idée de retirer votre main effleure votre esprit, les mâchoires du servitor vous enserrent de toutes leurs forces. La douleur vous transperce le cerveau comme une aiguille chauffée à blanc.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As soon as the thought of pulling your hand out crosses your mind, the servitor's jaws clench with all their frightening might. Pain shoots through your brain like a white-hot needle.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}À l'instant même où l'idée de retirer votre main effleure votre esprit, les mâchoires du servitor vous enserrent de toutes leurs forces. La douleur vous transperce le cerveau comme une aiguille chauffée à blanc.{/n}

languages.text: {n}En cuanto la idea de apartar la mano se te pasa por la cabeza, las mandíbulas del servidor se cierran con todas sus espantosas fuerzas. Una punzada de dolor te recorre el cerebro como si le hubieran clavado una aguja al rojo vivo.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As soon as the thought of pulling your hand out crosses your mind, the servitor's jaws clench with all their frightening might. Pain shoots through your brain like a white-hot needle.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}En cuanto la idea de apartar la mano se te pasa por la cabeza, las mandíbulas del servidor se cierran con todas sus espantosas fuerzas. Una punzada de dolor te recorre el cerebro como si le hubieran clavado una aguja al rojo vivo.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Elini çekme düşüncesi aklından geçer geçmez hizmetörün ağzı, korkunç gücüyle kapanıyor. Acı, kızgın bir metal misali beynine saplanıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As soon as the thought of pulling your hand out crosses your mind, the servitor's jaws clench with all their frightening might. Pain shoots through your brain like a white-hot needle.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Elini çekme düşüncesi aklından geçer geçmez hizmetörün ağzı, korkunç gücüyle kapanıyor. Acı, kızgın bir metal misali beynine saplanıyor sanki.{/n}
